questions.question: This arc is where Luffy first demonstrates Gear Second and Gear Third while battling against CP9. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates arrive at the ghostly island of Zou, home to a tribe of Minkmen and a crucial ally in their journey. What is...?
This arc features Luffy's journey to a prison mine where he encounters a key character from his past. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to manipulate and become light. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to turn their body parts into weapons. What is...?
This ability, used by a Straw Hat crew member, allows them to turn their body parts into weapons. What is...?
This lesser-known member of the Revolutionary Army is recognized for his ability to create powerful winds and for being the second-in-command to Monkey D. Dragon. Who is...?
This character, known for their nickname 'Dead Bones', is a former Warlord of the Sea and master of swordsmanship. Who is...?
This former member of the Royal Shichibukai is known for their Snake-Snake Fruit powers and role as the queen of Amazon Lily. Who is...?
